zipkin.interop

Class ScalaSpanStoreAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.zipkin.storage.SpanStore
      • zipkin.interop.ScalaSpanStoreAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public final class ScalaSpanStoreAdapter
extends com.twitter.zipkin.storage.SpanStore
    Adapts a StorageComponent to a scala SpanStore in order to test against its com.twitter.zipkin.storage.SpanStoreSpec for interoperability reasons.

    This implementation uses thrift TBinaryProtocol to ensure structures are compatible.
